original: / gang phyir dngos rnams thams cad kyi //

original: so so dngos po thams cad la //

analyzed: chos mi mthun phyir yod med min //

original: skye ba med pas gnas 'gag med //
analyzed: skye ba med pas gnas 'gag med //

original: gang zhig skyes de bskyed bya min //

original: skye bzhin pa yang bskyed bya min //

analyzed: 'bras bu yod pas 'bras ldan rgyu // rgyu min dang mtshungs med pa yang //

analyzed: de med 'du byed mi 'byung zhing //

analyzed: phan tshun rgyu phyir de gnyis ni //

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni ma grub yin // gang zhig bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis //

analyzed: de phyir gzhan las grub pa yis //

analyzed: mthong ba phyin ci log las yin //

analyzed: gal nye skye 'gag med yin na //

analyzed: 'gag med gang de thar min nam //

analyzed: gal te cig shos ltar na rtag / de phyir dngos dang dngos med dag / mya ngan 'das par rung ma yin //

analyzed: gal te 'gog par 'ga' gnas na //

original: dngos po med phyir dus gsum ni //
analyzed: dngos po med phyir dus gsum ni //

analyzed: yod pa ma yin rtog pa tsam //

analyzed: gang @25b phyir skye dang gnas dang 'jig /'dus byas mtshan nyid 'di gsum med //

original: de phyir 'dus byas nyid ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir 'dus byas nyid ma yin //

original: 'dus ma byas la'ang cung zad med //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la'ang cung zad med //

analyzed: ma zhig mi 'jig zhig pa'ang min //

analyzed: gnas pa gnas pa ma yin te //

analyzed: mi gnas pa yang gnas ma yin //

original: skyes pa mi skye ma skyes min //
analyzed: skyes pa mi skye ma skyes min //

original: 'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas //

original: du ma ma yin gcig ma yin //
analyzed: du ma ma yin gcig ma yin //

original: yod min med min yod med min //
analyzed: yod min med min yod med min //

original: mtshams 'dir sna tshogs thams cad 'dus //
analyzed: mtshams 'dir sna tshogs thams cad 'dus //
translated: Here, all varieties are included.ğŸ”½The BhagavÄn Guru taught karma, the basis of karma,

original: las rnams chud mi za bar gsungs //
analyzed: las rnams chud mi za bar gsungs //

original: las rnams rang bzhin med gsungs te //
analyzed: las rnams rang bzhin med gsungs te //

original: ma skyes gang de chud mi za //
analyzed: ma skyes gang de chud mi za //

original: de las kyang ni bdag 'dzin skye //
analyzed: de las kyang ni bdag 'dzin skye //

original: de bskyed 'dzin de'ang rnam rtog las //
analyzed: de bskyed 'dzin de'ang rnam rtog las //

original: gal te las la rang bzhin yod //
analyzed: gal te las la rang bzhin yod //

original: de skyes lus ni rtag par 'gyur //
analyzed: de skyes lus ni rtag par 'gyur //

original: las kyang sdug bsngal rnam smin can //
analyzed: las kyang sdug bsngal rnam smin can //

original: mi 'gyur de phyir bdag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'gyur de phyir bdag tu 'gyur //

original: las ni rkyen skyes yod min zhing //
analyzed: las ni rkyen skyes yod min zhing //

original: rkyen min las skyes cung zad med //
analyzed: rkyen min las skyes cung zad med //

original: lus ni las kyi rgyu mtshan can //
analyzed: lus ni las kyi rgyu mtshan can //

analyzed: gsum ka'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong //

original: las med na ni byed po med //
analyzed: las med na ni byed po med //

analyzed: de gnyis med pas 'bras bu med //

analyzed: de med nye bar spyod pa med //

analyzed: de bas dngos po dben pa yin //

original: las ni stong par yang dag pa'i //
analyzed: las ni stong par yang dag pa'i //

analyzed: shes na de nyid mthong ba'i phyir //

original: las ni 'byung ste de med na //
analyzed: las ni 'byung ste de med na //

analyzed: las las 'byung gang mi 'byung ngo //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni sprul pa sprul //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni sprul pa sprul //

original: sprul pa de yis slar yang ni //
analyzed: sprul pa de yis slar yang ni //

original: sprul pa gzhan zhig sprul gyur pa //
analyzed: sprul pa gzhan zhig sprul gyur pa //

analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs sprul stong //
translated: the TathÄgataâ€™s emanation is empty,

original: sprul pas sprul pa smos ci dgos //
analyzed: sprul pas sprul pa smos ci dgos //
translated: so what need is there to mention the emanation of an emanation?

original: gnyis po ming tsam yod pa yang //
analyzed: gnyis po ming tsam yod pa yang //
translated: Both are mere names, and even that existence

original: gang ci'ang rung ste rtog pa tsam //
analyzed: gang ci'ang rung ste rtog pa tsam //
translated: is just a concept, whatever it may be.

original: de bzhin byed po sprul dang mtshungs //
analyzed: de bzhin byed po sprul dang mtshungs //
translated: In the same way, the creator is like an emanation,

original: las ni sprul pas sprul dang mtshungs //
analyzed: las ni sprul pas sprul dang mtshungs //
translated: and the action is like an emanation of an emanation.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong gang cung zad //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong gang cung zad //
translated: Whatever exists, even a little, is empty by nature,

original: yod pa de dag rtog pa tsam //
analyzed: yod pa de dag rtog pa tsam //
translated: and those are just concepts.

original: gal te las kyi rang bzhin yod //ğŸ”½myang @26a * //
analyzed: gal te las kyi rang bzhin yod // myang @26a * //
translated: If the nature of action exists,

original: 'das byed po las kyang med //
analyzed: 'das byed po las kyang med //
translated: then nirvÄá¹‡a would be an agent and action.

original: gal te med na las bskyed pa //
analyzed: gal te med na las bskyed pa //
translated: If it does not exist,

original: 'bras bu sdug dang mi sdug med //
analyzed: 'bras bu sdug dang mi sdug med //
translated: then there would be no pleasant or unpleasant results of action.

original: yod ces pa yod med ces yod //
analyzed: yod ces pa yod med ces yod //
translated: â€œExistâ€ is said to be â€œexist and not exist.â€

original: yod dang med ces de yang yod //
analyzed: yod dang med ces de yang yod //
translated: â€œExist and not existâ€ is also said to exist.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yis //
translated: The intention of the buddhas

original: gsungs pa rtogs par sla ma yin //
analyzed: gsungs pa rtogs par sla ma yin //
translated: Is not easy to understand.

original: gal te gzugs ni rang 'byung bzhin //
analyzed: gal te gzugs ni rang 'byung bzhin //
translated: If form were to arise from itself,

original: gzugs de 'byung las 'byung ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs de 'byung las 'byung ma yin //
translated: That form would not arise from the elements.

original: rang las byung min ma yin nam //
analyzed: rang las byung min ma yin nam //
translated: Is it not the case that it arises from itself?

original: gzhan las kyang min de med phyir //ğŸ”½gcig la bzhi nyid yod min cing //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang min de med phyir // gcig la bzhi nyid yod min cing //
translated: It does not arise from another because that does not exist.ğŸ”½Fourfoldness does not exist in one,

original: bzhi la'ang gcig nyid yod min pas //ğŸ”½gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi //
analyzed: bzhi la'ang gcig nyid yod min pas // gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi //
translated: And one does not exist in four.ğŸ”½How can form exist

original: rgyur byas nas grub ji ltar yod //
analyzed: rgyur byas nas grub ji ltar yod //
translated: By being established from the four great elements as its cause?

original: shin tu mi 'dzin phyir de med //
analyzed: shin tu mi 'dzin phyir de med //
translated: Because it is not apprehended at all, it does not exist.

original: rtags las she na rtags de'ang med //
analyzed: rtags las she na rtags de'ang med //
translated: If you say that it is due to a sign, that sign does not exist.

original: rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it arises from causes and conditions,

original: rtags med par yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: rtags med par yang mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that it exists without a sign.

original: gal te blo des gzugs 'dzin na //
analyzed: gal te blo des gzugs 'dzin na //
translated: If that cognition apprehends form,

original: rang gi rang bzhin la 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin la 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: It would apprehend its own nature.

original: rkyen las skyes pas yod min pas //
analyzed: rkyen las skyes pas yod min pas //
translated: Since it does not exist because it arises from conditions,

original: yang dag gzugs med ji ltar 'dzin //
analyzed: yang dag gzugs med ji ltar 'dzin //
translated: How could it apprehend real form?

original: ji skad bshad gzugs skyes pa'i blo'i //
analyzed: ji skad bshad gzugs skyes pa'i blo'i //
translated: The mind that arises from the form

original: skad cig skad cig gis mi 'dzin //ğŸ”½'das dang ma 'ongs gzugs kyi ni //
analyzed: skad cig skad cig gis mi 'dzin // 'das dang ma 'ongs gzugs kyi ni //
translated: Does not apprehend it moment by moment.ğŸ”½How can it know the past and future

original: de yis ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: Forms that it has never experienced?

original: gang tshe nam yang kha dog dang // dbyibs dag tha dad nyid med pas //
analyzed: gang tshe nam yang kha dog dang // dbyibs dag tha dad nyid med pas //
translated: Since color and shape are never different,

original: de dag tha dad 'dzin yod min //
analyzed: de dag tha dad 'dzin yod min //
translated: There is no apprehension of their difference.

original: gzugs de gcig tu'ang grags pa min //
analyzed: gzugs de gcig tu'ang grags pa min //
translated: Form is not known to be a unity.

original: mig blo mig la yod min te //
analyzed: mig blo mig la yod min te //
translated: The eye consciousness does not exist in the eye,

original: gzugs la yod min par na med //
analyzed: gzugs la yod min par na med //
translated: Nor does it exist in form, nor anywhere else.ğŸ”½It is a misconception that it exists

original: gzugs dang mig la brten nas de //ğŸ”½yongs su rtog pa log pa yin //
analyzed: gzugs dang mig la brten nas de // yongs su rtog pa log pa yin //
translated: In dependence on the eye and form.

original: gal te mig bdag mig mthong na //
analyzed: gal te mig bdag mig mthong na //
translated: If the eye sees by means of the self of the eye,

original: de gzugs mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de gzugs mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can it see the form?

original: de phyir mig dang gzugs bdag med //
analyzed: de phyir mig dang gzugs bdag med //
translated: Therefore, the eye and form are devoid of self.

original: skye mched lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: skye mched lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The remaining sense bases are also like this.

original: mig ni rang bdag nyid kyis stong //
analyzed: mig ni rang bdag nyid kyis stong //
translated: The eye is empty of its own being.

original: de ni gzhan bdag gis kyang stong //
analyzed: de ni gzhan bdag gis kyang stong //
translated: It is also empty of the being of others.

original: gzugs kyang de bzhin stong pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs kyang de bzhin stong pa ste //
translated: Form is also empty in the same way.

original: skye mched lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: skye mched lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The remaining sense bases are also like this.

original: gang tshe gcig reg lhan cig 'gyur //
analyzed: gang tshe gcig reg lhan cig 'gyur //
translated: When one is touched, the other is not.

original: de tshe gzhan rnams stong pa nyid //
analyzed: de tshe gzhan rnams stong pa nyid //
translated: So the other is empty.

original: stong pa'am mi stong mi ston la //ğŸ”½mi stong pa yang rten mi brten //
analyzed: stong pa'am mi stong mi ston la // mi stong pa yang rten mi brten //
translated: It does not show that it is empty or not empty.ğŸ”½The nonempty does not depend on the dependent.

original: ngo bo mi gnas yod min pas //
analyzed: ngo bo mi gnas yod min pas //
translated: Since the essence does not endure,

original: gsum 'dus pa yod ma yin no //
analyzed: gsum 'dus pa yod ma yin no //
translated: the three do not exist.

original: de bdag nyid kyis reg med pas ;
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyis reg med pas ;
translated: Since it does not touch itself,

original: / de tshe tshor ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: / de tshe tshor ba yod ma yin //
translated: at that time, feeling does not exist.ğŸ”½Consciousness arises in dependence

original: nang dang phyi yi skye mched la //ğŸ”½brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung //
analyzed: nang dang phyi yi skye mched la // brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung //
translated: on the inner and outer sense bases.

original: de lta bas na rnam shes ni //
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam shes ni //
translated: Therefore, consciousness is empty,

original: smig rgyu sgyu ma bzhin du stong //
analyzed: smig rgyu sgyu ma bzhin du stong //
translated: like a mirage or an illusion.

original: rnam shes shes bya la brten nas //
analyzed: rnam shes shes bya la brten nas //
translated: Consciousness arises in dependence on the object of consciousness,

original: 'byung la shes bya yod ma yin //ğŸ”½shes bya shes pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'byung la shes bya yod ma yin // shes bya shes pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: but the object of consciousness does not exist.ğŸ”½Since the object of consciousness does not exist,

original: de phyir shes pa po nyid med //
analyzed: de phyir shes pa po nyid med //
translated: there is no consciousness.

original: thams cad @26b mi rtag yang na ni //
analyzed: thams cad @26b mi rtag yang na ni //
translated: Everything is impermanent,

original: mi rtag pa yang rtag pa med //
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang rtag pa med //
translated: but the impermanent does not exist.

original: dngos po rtag dang mi rtag nyid //
analyzed: dngos po rtag dang mi rtag nyid //
translated: If things were both permanent and impermanent,

original: 'gyur na de lta ga la yod //
analyzed: 'gyur na de lta ga la yod //
translated: how could that be?

original: sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / rkyen las chags sdang gti mug dngos //
analyzed: sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / rkyen las chags sdang gti mug dngos //
translated: Attraction, repulsion, and error are the causes of desire, hatred, and delusion.

original: 'byung phyir chags sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin gyis ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'byung phyir chags sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin gyis ni yod ma yin //
translated: Desire, hatred, and delusion do not exist inherently, because they arise from causes.

original: gang phyir de nyid la chags shing //
analyzed: gang phyir de nyid la chags shing //
translated: Because of attraction to that,

original: de la zhe sdang de la rmongs //
analyzed: de la zhe sdang de la rmongs //
translated: hatred of that, and delusion about that,

original: de phyir rnam par rtog pas bskyed //
analyzed: de phyir rnam par rtog pas bskyed //
translated: desire, hatred, and delusion are produced by conceptualization.

original: rtog de'ang yang dag nyid du med //ğŸ”½brtag bya gang de yod ma yin //
analyzed: rtog de'ang yang dag nyid du med // brtag bya gang de yod ma yin //
translated: But that conceptualization does not exist in reality.ğŸ”½The object of conceptualization does not exist.

original: brtag bya med rtog ga la yod //
analyzed: brtag bya med rtog ga la yod //
translated: How can there be a conceptualization without an object of conceptualization?

original: de phyir brtag bya rtog pa dag / rkyen las skyes phyir stong pa nyid //
analyzed: de phyir brtag bya rtog pa dag / rkyen las skyes phyir stong pa nyid //
translated: Therefore, since the object of conceptualization and conceptualization are produced from conditions, they are empty.

original: de nyid rtogs pas phyin ci log / bzhi las byung ba'i ma rig med //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pas phyin ci log / bzhi las byung ba'i ma rig med //
translated: By understanding that, the ignorance that arises from the four errors does not exist.

original: de med na ni 'du byed rnams /
analyzed: de med na ni 'du byed rnams /
translated: If that does not exist, compositional activity

original: mi 'byung lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: mi 'byung lhag ma'ang de bzhin no //
translated: does not arise, and the rest are also like that.

original: gang gang la brten skye ba'i dngos //
analyzed: gang gang la brten skye ba'i dngos //
translated: Whatever things arise in dependence on whatever things,

original: de de med pas de mi skye //
analyzed: de de med pas de mi skye //
translated: those do not exist without those.

original: dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas dang // 'dus ma byas 'di mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas dang // 'dus ma byas 'di mya ngan 'das //
translated: Things and non-things, the conditioned and the unconditioned, are nirvana.

original: rgyu rkyen las skyes dngos po rnams //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen las skyes dngos po rnams //
translated: Things that arise from causes and conditions,

original: yang dag nyid du rtog pa gang //
analyzed: yang dag nyid du rtog pa gang //
translated: Whatever is conceived to be real,

original: de ni ston pas ma rig gsungs //
analyzed: de ni ston pas ma rig gsungs //
translated: The Teacher has said that is ignorance.

original: de las yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung //
analyzed: de las yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung //
translated: From that, the twelve links arise.

original: dngos po stong par de rtogs nas //
analyzed: dngos po stong par de rtogs nas //
translated: When one realizes that things are empty,

original: yang dag mthong phyir rmongs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yang dag mthong phyir rmongs mi 'gyur //
translated: One sees reality and so is not confused.

original: de ni ma rig 'gog pa yin //
analyzed: de ni ma rig 'gog pa yin //
translated: That is the cessation of ignorance.ğŸ”½From that, the twelve links cease.ğŸ”½Formations are like a city of gandharvas,ğŸ”½Illusions, mirages, floating hairs,ğŸ”½Bubbles, water-foam, emanations,

original: de las yan lag bcu gnyis 'gag /'du byed dri za'i grong khyer dang // sgyu ma smig rgyu skra shad dang // dbu ba chu bur sprul pa dang // rmi lam mgal me'i 'khor lo mtshungs //
analyzed: de las yan lag bcu gnyis 'gag /'du byed dri za'i grong khyer dang // sgyu ma smig rgyu skra shad dang // dbu ba chu bur sprul pa dang // rmi lam mgal me'i 'khor lo mtshungs //
translated: Dreams, and a whirling firebrand.

original: dngos kun rang bzhin stong bas na //
analyzed: dngos kun rang bzhin stong bas na //
translated: All things are empty by nature.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs med pas //ğŸ”½rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs med pas // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di //
translated: The unequaled TathagatağŸ”½Has taught dependent origination

original: dngos po rnams su nye bar bstan //
analyzed: dngos po rnams su nye bar bstan //
translated: As the nature of all things.

original: dam pa'i don ni der zad de //
analyzed: dam pa'i don ni der zad de //
translated: This is the ultimate truth.ğŸ”½The various conventions of the world

original: 'jig rten dor byas tha snyad dag / sna tshogs thams cad rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: 'jig rten dor byas tha snyad dag / sna tshogs thams cad rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: Are the domain of the perfect Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis brten brtag mdzad //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis brten brtag mdzad //
translated: The Lord has taught dependent origination.

original: 'jig rten pa yi chos bstan mi 'jig cing //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi chos bstan mi 'jig cing //
translated: The teaching of worldly dharmas is not destroyed,

original: yang dag nyid du nam yang chos bsten med //ğŸ”½de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma rig pas //
analyzed: yang dag nyid du nam yang chos bsten med // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma rig pas //
translated: And the true dharma is never taught.ğŸ”½The TathÄgata taught that

original: de las dri med brjod pa 'di las skrag /'di la brten nas 'di 'byung zhes //
analyzed: de las dri med brjod pa 'di las skrag /'di la brten nas 'di 'byung zhes //
translated: The stainless is frightening to the ignorant.

original: 'jig rten tshul 'di mi 'gog cing //
analyzed: 'jig rten tshul 'di mi 'gog cing //
translated: This worldly way is not refuted,

original: gang brten rang bzhin med pas de //
analyzed: gang brten rang bzhin med pas de //
translated: And since that which is dependent has no intrinsic nature,

original: ji ltar yod 'gyur de nyid nges //
analyzed: ji ltar yod 'gyur de nyid nges //
translated: How could it exist? This is certain.

original: dad ldan de nyid chos la brtson //
analyzed: dad ldan de nyid chos la brtson //
translated: The faithful one who is devoted to the dharma

original: tshul 'di rigs pas rjes dpogs gang //
analyzed: tshul 'di rigs pas rjes dpogs gang //
translated: Will infer this method through reasoning.

original: brten med chos 'gal brtan pa yi //
analyzed: brten med chos 'gal brtan pa yi //
translated: Without dependence, the contradiction of a dharma is stable.

original: srid dang srid min spangs nas zhi //
analyzed: srid dang srid min spangs nas zhi //
translated: Having abandoned existence and nonexistence, there is peace.

original: 'di dag rkyen 'di las rigs nas //
analyzed: 'di dag rkyen 'di las rigs nas //
translated: These arise from conditions.

original: lta ngan dra ba kun ldog des //
analyzed: lta ngan dra ba kun ldog des //
translated: Thus, the net of bad views is reversed.

original: chags rmongs khong khro spangs pa'i phyir //ğŸ”½ma gos mya ngan 'das pa thog / stong nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur @27a * //
analyzed: chags rmongs khong khro spangs pa'i phyir // ma gos mya ngan 'das pa thog / stong nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur @27a * //
translated: Because attachment, ignorance, and anger are abandoned,ğŸ”½One attains uncontaminated nirvÄá¹‡a.

original: byas pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: byas pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Seventy Stanzas on Emptiness, Called â€œThe Essence of the Middle Wayâ€

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The treatise composed by the master Ä€rya NÄgÄrjuna is complete.

original: // / lo tstsha ba gzhon nu mchog dang / snyan dar ma grags dang khu'i 'gyur dag las don dang tshig bzang du bris pa'o//
analyzed: // / lo tstsha ba gzhon nu mchog dang / snyan dar ma grags dang khu'i 'gyur dag las don dang tshig bzang du bris pa'o//
